features: Packable: Minimal design and durable construction allows you to flatten and roll when empty and stow in bail handle
Flip top cap: Made for drinking during activity with an easy open cap cover and self-sealing silicone nozzle
Filter compatible: Attaches to most 28mm threaded water filters, use as your durable backcountry squeeze bag
Easy carry: Flexible bail handle for comfortable carrying, quick attachment, and filling in a lake or river.
